data.client_settings: Stable 14308, can also repro on Canary 14432
data.actual_result: custom color and default color are both selected
data.expected_result: Color picker should not allow #000000 to be chosen, and only display default as selected
data.short_description: attempting to change role color to #000000 using the mouse results in custom color and default color being selected
data.steps_to_repro: - *Roles cannot be #000000 (NAB)* - must have permission to edit role - enter edit role screen - use color picker to customize role color - use mouse to drag color to #000000 (black in corner) - drag mouse outside color picker box - release mouse - role color now shows as both default and #000000
